thread.title: Vermont yogurt company lands big contract
thread.title_full: Vermont yogurt company lands big contract - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Vermont yogurt company lands big contract
text:
BRATTLEBORO, Vt. - A Vermont yogurt company has landed a big new contract.
 Commonwealth Yogurt is one of three suppliers selected to provide Greek yogurt to schools in Vermont and Connecticut.
 It's part of a federally-assisted meal program.
 The Brattleboro company will now supply about 7,000 pounds of yogurt to schools, starting in September.
 Two New York companies, Chobani and Upstate Niagara Cooperative, were also chosen for the program.
